name: [Prototype] Starfinder
description:
Been thinking about a space exploration game that would let you draw star-maps , amongst other things.
Though a full game like that would be an overwhelming task just yet for one man alone, here's at least the constellation-making part.

If I ever expand on this prototype, I'd like to add naming stars and constellations, and a save/load system. No promises though.

• Controls :
 > L-Click to link stars.
 > R-Click to cancel or break a link
 > Quote or ² to create a new map from a custom seed
